divs: Sighting DetailsI was headed North on Pulaski and to the upper right of which was the Sun, I seen a flash of white light adjacent from the Sun. I thought of every possible thing to rule it out as an "UFO" (NOT SPACECRAFT) such the sun glaring from my windshield to the corner of my eye, but I didn't squint or anything.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Flossmoor
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: There was just of flash of white light in the direction of the sun.
